name: prompt-scrubber-monorepo
description: Prompt-Scrubber monorepo containing browser extension, web app, and server

scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:webapp
scripts.build:extension: cd extension && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:webapp: cd webapp && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:extension && npm run test:webapp && npm run test:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd extension && npm install && cd ../webapp && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf extension/dist extension/node_modules webapp/dist webapp/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules
